mapper.select: SELECT temp_type as 'codes',temp_type as 'names' from course_info GROUP BY temp_type ORDER BY temp_type
SELECT cw.codes,cw.`names` from course_unit_ware cuw LEFT JOIN course_ware cw on cuw.ware_code = cw.codes where cuw.unit_code = #{unit_code} and cuw.state='1' ORDER BY cuw.seq;
SELECT id as 'codes',names FROM views_column where 1=1 and is_parent='1' order by parent_id,orders
SELECT ur.account codes ,ur.account names FROM sys_user_role ur , sys_role_menu rm , sys_menu m WHERE m.id = rm.menu_id AND ur.role_code = rm.role_code AND m.author = #{author};
